author: dsh
msg: for now i just commented out the old implementation
that called the OpenORB JavaToIdl tool. that means
if the new IDLProcess task fails for whatever reason,
we are still able to switch bak to the old version
allthough, after a short period the commented out
stuff should be removed completly from the XML file.
